channel.title: xxDestructionxx - NEW development thread 562|604
channel.description:
xxDestructionxx - NEW development thread 562|604
[b]hey guys i know i previously made a Develeopment thread but it had no comments and i only added a few things at that time.
So, now today i'm making a new thread and showing you what i added on the base of Tko. So.. lets get started :D[/b]
these are the features of the base itself [code]TkoScape Info • Browser-based webclient. • RAR download client • 100% Runescape bank pins that you can reset if you forget the pin. • Great shops • Cash limits, so all your hard earned money wont reset to 1 coin. • Perfect range, stand far away from monsters wile you attack them. • Range requires arrows, then you can collect them after you have killed your opponent. • Shops fixed, no more having to close and reopen the stores. • Experienced staff members. • All chaotic weapons. • Primal armour, fractite armour, etc. • Newer bosses to challenge. • Chat effects (e.i. - green:shake: Hello) • Player following. • Clan chat. • Loot Share. • One click npc attacking. • One click player attacking. • One click npc trade. • Colored whips(Fixed animations). • Staff of Light. • New spirit shields.
Other Details • All skills fully trainable. • Clanwars safe and non-safe pking. • Bank tabs allowing you to organize your bank however you choose. • Plenty of bosses with rare drops. • Full screen high definition available. • Thieving for cash. • Dragon platebodys. • Pets that follow you. • All godswords fulling working. • Dragon fireshield. • Dragon claws with fully working special. • All PVP armour and weapons. • Bandos and Armadyl armour. • Great website. • Vote 4 Cash. • Crystal keys to open the magic chest (gives rare items). • New whip attack emotes (fixed to real one). • All skillcapes and emotions. • Trading interfaces fixed. • God Wars Dungeon. • Barrows mini-game. • Soul wars mini-game. • Pest control mini-game.[/code]
[i][b]Now for the things i've recently added! ;D ( some things above might be repeated by accedent srry if thats the case ) [/b][/i] [code]• 100% Runescape bank pins that you can reset if you forget the pin!! • Void Effects 100% Runescape!!! + Dharoks Maxing!! • 7+ Clue Scrolls 100% working! • Wyverns perfected • Ice Strykes ( adding the rest of the series later on ) • Several Donators already in only 6 days being public!! • Mages Guild + Rangers Guild (just need to add npcs then 100%+required level!!) • ALL Dupes fixed + login waiting limit for trading ( to prevent dupers ;) ) • Voting shops + Pking Shops + Pits Shop (with good items in there!) • Cash limits, so all your hard earned money wont reset to 1 coin =D • Flawless 100% Following + Following in PvP and anywhere!! • Perfected range, stand far away from monsters wile you attack them. • Range requires arrows, then you can collect them after you have killed your opponent. • All Magic spells you need Runes for, except for teleports to places. all far-casting 100% even Miasmic is perfect+autocast • Shops fixed, no more having to close and reopen the stores. • Custom Guilds 100% (Mage, Range) • Highly experienced staff members of xxDestructionxx • All chaotic weapons with correct Anims/GFX • Low and High Alching is now 100% working with proper amounts! • All Dungeoneering armor you can think of we got in here ;) • Newer bosses to challenge. • QuikChat 100% working! • 100% working Chat Effects • Cooking and Fishing 100% like Runescape (waiting,burnt food) • Player following is now perfected even in PvP! • Clan chat system has been fixed up, and you can change the name of your clan ;) • Loot Share is completed • Frost Dragons 100% working • One click npc attacking. • One click player attacking. • One click npc trade. • Colored whips(Fixed animations + specials - wich as same as the normal whip special) • Staff of Light (just finishing up the special) • New spirit shields + effects just like Runescape • Add all pets for benifits, working looks,anims,gfx + a few dialogs on some of the Pets! • New Lunar Teleport looks • All Specials on all the correct items that have it normaly on Runescape. • 100% working Jad + Fighting Pits (even if you lose in Pits u get 2 tokkul!) - wich can be bought at the tokkul shop located at home. • Quike Teleports in the Achievements Tab • Next to NO lag! (if it somewhat lags it’s most liekly your computer!) - 0%! not vps! • Godwars Dungeon - All Bosses • Donator Zone • All skills fully trainable. • Clanwars safe and non-safe pking. • Bank tabs allowing you to organize your bank however you choose. • Plenty of bosses with rare drops. • Full screen high definition available. • Thieving for cash. • Dragon platebodys. • Pets that follow you. • All godswords fulling working. • Dragon fireshield. • Dragon claws with fully working special. • All PVP armour and weapons. • Bandos and Armadyl armour. • Great website. • Grand Exchange is 98% completed (only 2 bugs left!) • Vote 4 Cash. • Crystal keys to open the magic chest (gives rare items). • New whip attack emotes (fixed to real one). • All skillcapes and emotions. • Trading interfaces fixed. • God Wars Dungeon. • Barrows mini-game. • Full working 100% Summoning! (NOW MOVED TO ACTUAL RUNESCAPE SPOT!!! • Soul wars mini-game + working shop 100% • Pest control mini-game. • Custom Interface when you click on the Summoning Icon you see the Familiars Head (also works with the Pets for donators!) [/code]
[size=12pt][i][b]here is some pictures to give with it ;)[/b][/i][/size] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/iwupzl.png[/img][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2efol7a.png[/img][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/10fe2ar.png[/img][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/ayq4xy.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2jwt8h.png[/img][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/23vf32e.png[/img][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/j7t4rm.png[/img][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/iwuow4.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/ossltu.png[/img][img]http://i51.tinypic.com/p22w2.png[/img][img]http://i51.tinypic.com/98hyk1.png[/img][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2lt1yli.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/28hl8pl.png[/img][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/ibdp8n.png[/img][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/k4jntk.gif[/img][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/jr6wqp.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/34fmfzk.jpg[/img][img]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkoveng.png[/img][img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/199/donorshopd.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2wm0z14.png[/img][img]http://i1238.photobucket.com/albums/ff492/bubbazeebo/boss5.jpg[/img]
Now here is the Rangers Guild + Mages Guild on Video! Ranger ->[url=http://tinypic.com/r/21meqes/7]http://tinypic.com/r/21meqes/7[/url] Mages ->[url=http://tinypic.com/r/29vz22o/7]http://tinypic.com/r/29vz22o/7[/url] Summoning Update -> [url=http://tinypic.com/r/fthq1y/7]http://tinypic.com/r/fthq1y/7[/url]
[I]Future Updates/Goals![I] ~ Finish up the Grand Exchange (98% Done) ~ Make a few Quests (Already in the make of some) ~ Donator Minigame ~ Staff Minigame ~ Anything Else That Would Make The Server Better!
Applications for Coding. (Current Coder(s): Owner Den <- me) [code]Name: How Long Have You Had Expereince In 562 Coding: What's You Timezone:[/code]
There will surely be tones and tones of new things added onto the server and will become updated directly to this thread so stay active ;D !
thanks for look at my development thread hope there are soem good coders out there that can code with me. -Fish

item.title: xxDestructionxx - NEW development thread 562|604
item.dc:creator: @xxifish_i_x xxifish i x
item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

xxDestructionxx - NEW development thread 562|604

[b]hey guys i know i previously made a Develeopment thread but it had no comments and i only added a few things at that time.

So, now today i’m making a new thread and showing you what i added on the base of Tko.
So… lets get started :D[/b]

these are the features of the base itself

[code]TkoScape Info
• Browser-based webclient.
• RAR download client
• 100% Runescape bank pins that you can reset if you forget the pin.
• Great shops
• Cash limits, so all your hard earned money wont reset to 1 coin.
• Perfect range, stand far away from monsters wile you attack them.
• Range requires arrows, then you can collect them after you have killed your opponent.
• Shops fixed, no more having to close and reopen the stores.
• Experienced staff members.
• All chaotic weapons.
• Primal armour, fractite armour, etc.
• Newer bosses to challenge.
• Chat effects (e.i. - green:shake: Hello)
• Player following.
• Clan chat.
• Loot Share.
• One click npc attacking.
• One click player attacking.
• One click npc trade.
• Colored whips(Fixed animations).
• Staff of Light.
• New spirit shields.

Other Details
• All skills fully trainable.
• Clanwars safe and non-safe pking.
• Bank tabs allowing you to organize your bank however you choose.
• Plenty of bosses with rare drops.
• Full screen high definition available.
• Thieving for cash.
• Dragon platebodys.
• Pets that follow you.
• All godswords fulling working.
• Dragon fireshield.
• Dragon claws with fully working special.
• All PVP armour and weapons.
• Bandos and Armadyl armour.
• Great website.
• Vote 4 Cash.
• Crystal keys to open the magic chest (gives rare items).
• New whip attack emotes (fixed to real one).
• All skillcapes and emotions.
• Trading interfaces fixed.
• God Wars Dungeon.
• Barrows mini-game.
• Soul wars mini-game.
• Pest control mini-game.[/code]

Now for the things i’ve recently added! ;D ( some things above might be repeated by accedent srry if thats the case )

• 100% Runescape bank pins that you can reset if you forget the pin!! • Void Effects 100% Runescape!!! + Dharoks Maxing!! • 7+ Clue Scrolls 100% working! • Wyverns perfected • Ice Strykes ( adding the rest of the series later on ) • Several Donators already in only 6 days being public!! • Mages Guild + Rangers Guild (just need to add npcs then 100%+required level!!) • ALL Dupes fixed + login waiting limit for trading ( to prevent dupers ;) ) • Voting shops + Pking Shops + Pits Shop (with good items in there!) • Cash limits, so all your hard earned money wont reset to 1 coin =D • Flawless 100% Following + Following in PvP and anywhere!! • Perfected range, stand far away from monsters wile you attack them. • Range requires arrows, then you can collect them after you have killed your opponent. • All Magic spells you need Runes for, except for teleports to places. all far-casting 100% even Miasmic is perfect+autocast • Shops fixed, no more having to close and reopen the stores. • Custom Guilds 100% (Mage, Range) • Highly experienced staff members of xxDestructionxx • All chaotic weapons with correct Anims/GFX • Low and High Alching is now 100% working with proper amounts! • All Dungeoneering armor you can think of we got in here ;) • Newer bosses to challenge. • QuikChat 100% working! • 100% working Chat Effects • Cooking and Fishing 100% like Runescape (waiting,burnt food) • Player following is now perfected even in PvP! • Clan chat system has been fixed up, and you can change the name of your clan ;) • Loot Share is completed • Frost Dragons 100% working • One click npc attacking. • One click player attacking. • One click npc trade. • Colored whips(Fixed animations + specials - wich as same as the normal whip special) • Staff of Light (just finishing up the special) • New spirit shields + effects just like Runescape • Add all pets for benifits, working looks,anims,gfx + a few dialogs on some of the Pets! • New Lunar Teleport looks • All Specials on all the correct items that have it normaly on Runescape. • 100% working Jad + Fighting Pits (even if you lose in Pits u get 2 tokkul!) - wich can be bought at the tokkul shop located at home. • Quike Teleports in the Achievements Tab • Next to NO lag! (if it somewhat lags it’s most liekly your computer!) - 0%! not vps! • Godwars Dungeon - All Bosses • Donator Zone • All skills fully trainable. • Clanwars safe and non-safe pking. • Bank tabs allowing you to organize your bank however you choose. • Plenty of bosses with rare drops. • Full screen high definition available. • Thieving for cash. • Dragon platebodys. • Pets that follow you. • All godswords fulling working. • Dragon fireshield. • Dragon claws with fully working special. • All PVP armour and weapons. • Bandos and Armadyl armour. • Great website. • Grand Exchange is 98% completed (only 2 bugs left!) • Vote 4 Cash. • Crystal keys to open the magic chest (gives rare items). • New whip attack emotes (fixed to real one). • All skillcapes and emotions. • Trading interfaces fixed. • God Wars Dungeon. • Barrows mini-game. • Full working 100% Summoning! (NOW MOVED TO ACTUAL RUNESCAPE SPOT!!! • Soul wars mini-game + working shop 100% • Pest control mini-game. • Custom Interface when you click on the Summoning Icon you see the Familiars Head (also works with the Pets for donators!)

[size=12pt]here is some pictures to give with it [/size]

iwupzl.png1600×870

23vf32e.png1485×486

ossltu.png704×447



Now here is the Rangers Guild + Mages Guild on Video!
